text: Gunilla Hjerdt (born February 1942) is a former Swedish long track speed skater, who was active in the 1960s. Hjerdt represented her nation at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women in 1961, finishing 24th overall. She also competed at other international competitions. Between 1960 and 1964 she competed four times at the Swedish Allround Championships, with the best result in 1963 finishing fifth overall. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Swedish female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Gunilla Hjerdt
